wikipedia.paragraphdump: Finish Line, Inc. is an American retail chain that sells athletic shoes and related apparel and accessories. The company operates 660 stores in 47 states and Puerto Rico, mostly in enclosed shopping malls, as well as Finish Line-branded athletic shoe departments in more than 450 Macy's stores. On June 18, 2018, the company was acquired by JD Sports after the completion of its merger at a price of $13.50 per share in cash. . On March 23, 2005, the company restated its financial results to reflect straight line expense over the lease term including any rent-free build-out periods.

crunchbase.Transaction Name: Finish Line acquired by JD Sports Fashion Plc
crunchbase.smalldescription: The Finish Line, Inc. (NASDAQ: FINL) is a premium retailer of athletic shoes, apparel and accessories. Headquartered in Indianapolis.
crunchbase.longdescription: Finish Line, Inc. is a leading athletic retailer offering the best selection of brand name footwear, apparel and accessories. The company operates more than 660 stores in 47 states and online at www.finishline.com.
insights: Finish Line is registered under the ticker  NASDAQ:FINL .
Finish Line has acquired Greater Boston Running Co. on Sep 2, 2011.
Finish Line is actively using 54 technologies for its website. These include SPF,Apache,andWordPress.
Finish Line has registered 18 trademarks with the most popular class being 'Advertising; business'.
Finish Line has 1 current team member, Director, Security and Compliance Cory Deeter.
Finish Line has 2 board members and advisors, including Faisal Masud.
